dct_description_sm: gedrukt 't Amsterdam by Reiner & Josua Ottens en te bekomen te Emden by den aucteur voorn.

California shown as a large, labeled island with a rounded northern coast, place names and small islands on either side. The area above is not mapped. Straet of Anian is labeled. No Great Lakes are shown. Southern parts of hemispheres are labeled Incognita. A partial outline of New Zealand and Australia is shown.
Includes 14 ancillary maps showing solar eclipses, 2 ancillary lunar maps, and ill.
